title: How to Draw a Cat Using the Word Cat

steps.headline: Start with blank piece of paper and the word CAT.
steps.description: Get a blank piece of paper. Write the letters C - A - T with a centimeter gap between each letters using a pencil. Create a hook like shape, on the letter T, at the end, as shown in the image above.

steps.headline: Create the tail first.
steps.description:
Draw another letter "C" over the existing "C"
Connect the ends to make the shape of a tail. Connect the "C" to the letter "A" as shown.

steps.headline: Create Paws and hind leg.
steps.description:
Turn the letter "A" into a circle
Use the hook at the end of the letter "A" to create the shape of back leg.

steps.headline: Draw front paws and Head.
steps.description: Draw a mushroom shape at top for the head on letter "T". Draw rounded shape on the vertical line of the letter "T" to make the shape of mouth and nose. Draw the front paws using the bottom of the letter "T" as a reference.

steps.headline: Apply finishing touches.
steps.description: Add any extra details, such as fur or patterns to your liking.

text:
Start with blank piece of paper and the word CAT. Get a blank piece of paper. Write the letters C - A - T with a centimeter gap between each letters using a pencil. Create a hook like shape, on the letter T, at the end, as shown in the image above. Create the tail first. Draw another letter "C" over the existing "C"
Connect the ends to make the shape of a tail. Connect the "C" to the letter "A" as shown. Create Paws and hind leg. Turn the letter "A" into a circle
Use the hook at the end of the letter "A" to create the shape of back leg. Draw front paws and Head. Draw a mushroom shape at top for the head on letter "T". Draw rounded shape on the vertical line of the letter "T" to make the shape of mouth and nose. Draw the front paws using the bottom of the letter "T" as a reference. Apply finishing touches. Add any extra details, such as fur or patterns to your liking.
sentences: Start with blank piece of paper and the word CAT.
Get a blank piece of paper.
Write the letters C - A - T with a centimeter gap between each letters using a pencil.
Create a hook like shape, on the letter T, at the end, as shown in the image above.

Draw another letter "C" over the existing "C"
Connect the ends to make the shape of a tail.
Connect the "C" to the letter "A" as shown.

Turn the letter "A" into a circle
Use the hook at the end of the letter "A" to create the shape of back leg.
Draw a mushroom shape at top for the head on letter "T".
Draw rounded shape on the vertical line of the letter "T" to make the shape of mouth and nose.
Draw the front paws using the bottom of the letter "T" as a reference.
Add any extra details, such as fur or patterns to your liking.
